attributes.action: ensure that Gordon Brown doesn't automatically become PM without a majority vote of the people of the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should Gordon Brown become PM just because a minority of the country wants him to?  As the political leader of the country all PMs should first stand for election before the country not a few thousand activists.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
